resources.string: in an area separated from the main hallway. Look behind the Student Break-out or sitting area.
Take the Northern Stairs in CC2. Then…
Take the Main Stairs in CC1. Then…
Building is unknown. Please rescan the QR code again.

in a hallway that branches off West of the main hallway. You will take a West turn off of the main hall, and then rooms will be found to your right or left as you proceed through this U shaped hallway.
after you\'ve entered the U shaped hallway
Scan A New QR Code At Anytime
Please find A QR Code nearby, then click on the SCAN QR Code button below.
Enter your destination room number (leave off any letters):
Where do you want to go?
The room you entered is invalid or an empty field. Please enter the room number you\'re looking for.\n\nOr select a preset location below.
The room number [%1$s] was not found. Please verify the room number and re-enter it following the format of BUILDING-ROOM.\n\nFor example, CC1-041 must include the zero (0) in front of 41.
The building [%1$s] was not found.\nPlease verify the building and re-enter it.
Take a %1$s and walk down the hall. The room %2$s is located on your %3$s
Rooms 101 through 104 A-G are straight ahead. For rooms 105 thru 108 A-C, take a RIGHT and follow the hall way.
Take the main stairs in the CC1 building to the %1$s floor and turn %2$s. The room %3$s will be on your %4$s.
Take the main stairs to the %1$s floor and turn %2$s. The room %3$s will be on your %4$s
You\'re in building %1$s and want to go to building %2$s.
Exit the building through the West facing entrance on the 1st floor. The %1$s building will be straight ahead on your %2$s

Exit the building through the Main, South facing entrance on the 1st floor. Take a Left and go down the hill to get on the main pathway heading South. The %1$s building main entrance will be on your %2$s
Exit the building through the West facing entrance on the 1st floor. Take a RIGHT, The building %1$s will be on your %2$s straight ahead
Exit the building through the East facing entrance on the 1st floor. Take a LEFT, The building %1$s will be on your %2$s straight ahead
Exit the %1$s building through the %2$s facing entrance on the first floor and take a %3$s. The %4$s buidling is straight ahead on your %5$s
Exit the building through the main entrance on the first floor and your destination is straight ahead.
as you head %1$s on the main sidewalk.
Turn around.\nRoom %1$s is located behind you.
Take a %1$s and go forward into building %2$s. The room %3$s is located on your %4$s.
You\'ve arrived at your destination. Look left or right to find the door to room %1$s.
You scanned an invalid QR Code\n[%1$s]\nPlease scan a Cascadia Directions QR code.
Unable to determine the QR code you scanned. Please rescan or scan a different QR code nearby.
